content: red heart pattern # rhc0103-023675m skill level intermediate gauge 3 repeats = 5¼ 14 row = 5 in pat yarn 4 ounces 0365 coffee ca and 3¼ ounces 0774 light raspberry cb please note the url for this pattern displays both the crochet and the knit versions of this pattern this particular entry is for the crochet version of the bag the knit version is here 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/knit-ripple-bag
